languages.text: "Мы следуем своими стезями — так будет и впредь. До дня, пока мы не пребудем в объятиях Его". {n}Кибелла изгибает губы в улыбке.{/n} "Но то, что между нами... оно протянуло между нами паутину, по нитям которой будем посылать мы друг другу свою любовь. Я буду сильной и выдержу. Ради Завета. Ради тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Мы следуем своими стезями — так будет и впредь. До того дня, пока мы не пребудем в объятиях Его". {n}Кибелла изгибает губы в улыбке.{/n} "Но то, что между нами... оно протянуло между нами паутину, по нитям которой будем посылать мы друг другу свою любовь. Я буду сильной и выдержу. Ради Анн'Шини. Ради тебя".

languages.text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."
languages.original_text: "Мы следуем своими стезями — так будет и впредь. До дня, пока мы не пребудем в объятиях Его". {n}Кибелла изгибает губы в улыбке.{/n} "Но то, что между нами... оно протянуло между нами паутину, по нитям которой будем посылать мы друг другу свою любовь. Я буду сильной и выдержу. Ради Завета. Ради тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Now and forth we walk, each upon our own way. And so it shall be, until we are in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. For Ahn'shini. For you."

"Now and forth we walk, each upon our own way. And so it shall be, until we are in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. For Ahn'shini. For you."

It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

languages.text: «Ahora y siempre, cada uno de nosotros ha de seguir su propio hilo. Y así seguirá siendo hasta el día en que nos encontremos en Su abrazo». {n}Sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa.{/n} «Pero, en cuanto a nosotr{mf|o|a}s... Se ha formado una red que nos une, y nuestro amor la recorrerá. Seré fuerte. Aguantaré. Porque es lo que exige la Doctrina, y porque es lo menos que puedo hacer por ti».
languages.original_text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora y siempre, cada uno de nosotros ha de seguir su propio hilo. Y así seguirá siendo hasta el día en que nos encontremos en Su abrazo». {n}Sus labios se curvan en una sonrisa.{/n} «Pero, en cuanto a nosotr{mf|o|a}s... Se ha formado una red que nos une, y nuestro amor la recorrerá. Seré fuerte. Aguantaré. Porque es lo que exige la Doctrina, y porque es lo menos que puedo hacer por ti».

languages.text: 「これからもずっと、私たちはそれぞれの糸を辿っていきます。主の抱擁の中に身を置くその日まで、そうあり続けるのです」{n}彼女の唇が笑みの形にゆがむ。{/n}「ですが、私たちの間にあるもの…それがあなたと私を結び付ける網を作り、その網に沿って私たちの愛は巡る。私は強くあり続けましょう。そして耐え続けましょう。なぜなら、それこそが教義が求めるものであり、私にできることはそれしかないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

traits.locale_text: 「これからもずっと、私たちはそれぞれの糸を辿っていきます。主の抱擁の中に身を置くその日まで、そうあり続けるのです」{n}彼女の唇が笑みの形にゆがむ。{/n}「ですが、私たちの間にあるもの…それがあなたと私を結び付ける網を作り、その網に沿って私たちの愛は巡る。私は強くあり続けましょう。そして耐え続けましょう。なぜなら、それこそが教義が求めるものであり、私にできることはそれしかないのだから」

languages.text: “从现在到永远，你我必须沿着各自的丝线前进，直到有朝一日，我们回到祂的怀抱。”{n}她的唇角露出了微笑。{/n}“但你我之间……出现了一张网，把你我二人连接在一起。我们的爱会沿着网的脉络不断延伸，我会始终保持坚强，不惧一切，因为这就是教义的要求，因为我愿意为了你做任何事情。”
languages.original_text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

traits.locale_text: “从现在到永远，你我必须沿着各自的丝线前进，直到有朝一日，我们回到祂的怀抱。”{n}她的唇角露出了微笑。{/n}“但你我之间……出现了一张网，把你我二人连接在一起。我们的爱会沿着网的脉络不断延伸，我会始终保持坚强，不惧一切，因为这就是教义的要求，因为我愿意为了你做任何事情。”

languages.text: "Jetzt und für immer muss jeder von uns seinem eigenen Faden folgen. Und so soll es sein, bis wir uns in Seiner Umarmung wiederfinden." {n}Ein Lächeln umspielt ihre Lippen.{/n} "Aber was zwischen uns ist ... Es hat ein Netz gesponnen, das uns vereint, und unsere Liebe wird diesem Netz folgen. Ich werde stark bleiben. Ich werde ausharren. Denn das ist es, was die Grundsätze verlangen. Deshalb darf ich nicht weniger für Euch tun."
languages.original_text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

traits.locale_text: "Jetzt und für immer muss jeder von uns seinem eigenen Faden folgen. Und so soll es sein, bis wir uns in Seiner Umarmung wiederfinden." {n}Ein Lächeln umspielt ihre Lippen.{/n} "Aber was zwischen uns ist ... Es hat ein Netz gesponnen, das uns vereint, und unsere Liebe wird diesem Netz folgen. Ich werde stark bleiben. Ich werde ausharren. Denn das ist es, was die Grundsätze verlangen. Deshalb darf ich nicht weniger für Euch tun."

languages.text: « Maintenant et à jamais, nous devons {mf|chacun|chacune} suivre notre propre fil. Et il en sera ainsi jusqu'à ce que nous rejoignions Son giron protecteur. » {n}Ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Mais les sentiments qui nous unissent ont tissé entre nous une toile sur laquelle notre amour évoluera. Je saurai rester forte. Je tiendrai bon. Parce que les préceptes sacrés l'exigent, et parce que c'est le moins que je puisse faire pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant et à jamais, nous devons {mf|chacun|chacune} suivre notre propre fil. Et il en sera ainsi jusqu'à ce que nous rejoignions Son giron protecteur. » {n}Ses lèvres s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « Mais les sentiments qui nous unissent ont tissé entre nous une toile sur laquelle notre amour évoluera. Je saurai rester forte. Je tiendrai bon. Parce que les préceptes sacrés l'exigent, et parce que c'est le moins que je puisse faire pour vous. »

languages.text: "Ezelden ebediyete dek her birimiz, kendi ipliğimizin yolundan gitmekle yükümlüyüz. Ta ki O'nun bizi bağrına basacağı güne dek..." {n}Kıvrılan dudaklarında gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Ancak aramızda yaşananlar... İkimizi bir araya getiren bir ağ ördü. Bu ağ ile birlikte aşkımız da yayılacak. Kuvvetimi koruyacağım. Dayanacağım. Çünkü İlkeler bunu emrediyor ve... Senin için çok daha fazlasını yapabilirim."
languages.original_text: "Now and forever, each of us must follow our own thread. And so it shall be, until the day we find ourselves in His embrace." {n}Her lips curve into a smile.{/n} "But what's between us... It has made a web that joins you and me, and along that web our love will travel. I will stay strong. I will hold. Because it is what the Tenets demand, and because I can do no less for you."
